item.title: Area Plots and Histograms for Multiple Distributions
item.description: As a first post, I thought that I would go over a few different ways to visualize multiple distributions using histograms and area plots, as well as how different parameters might change how you view and interpret that data. In addition, perhaps you might learn from mistakes that I made along the way. First, let’s load some required packages: require("ggplot2") ## Loading required package: ggplot2 Now, let’s generate three slightly different normal distributions for this example:
